thread.title: Harden believes Houston Rockets will be better in 2015
thread.title_full: Harden believes Houston Rockets will be better in 2015

title: Harden believes Houston Rockets will be better in 2015
text:
> Texas Harden believes Houston Rockets will be better in 2015 Houston Rockets coach Kevin McHale gestures from the bench during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Golden State Warriors Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in Oakland, Calif. (AP Photo/Ben Margot)
